title: Error code 004
body: I need help because i keep getting the Error code 004 and says that it cant patch me up .please give me an advies to fix this.

replies.body:
Those 004 error codes typically happen when League is trying to scan the game files for updates and it gets block by your OS. It can happen sometimes if your OS doesn't recognize League as a safe program, but it's pretty easily fixed. 

Make sure to go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those settings adjusted, but hit us back up if you still can't get back on the Rift!
